title: [Epidemiology] Cohort study (n=52,998) finds that people with any previous severe allergy (n=474) are at higher risk of developing and allergic response to the mRNA COVID-19 vaccines (ARR: 2.46; 95% CI, 1.92-3.16) but reactions were mostly mild and did not impede completion of the vaccine regimen
[Social Science] ‘I will rather be killed by corona than by him…’: Experiences of abused women seeking shelter during South Africa’s COVID-19 lockdown
